pages.title: Tanzanite Armour
pages.text: To Make Infused Tanzanite Armour you will need one Infused Tanzanite per item you wish to make, a Diamond Piece of Armour matching that item and a Gem Upgrade Template.$(br)The Gem Upgrade Template goes in the First Slot, The Diamond Armour goes in the Second Slot and the Infused Tanzanite goes in the Third Slot

pages.title: Tanzanite Smithing
pages.text: Equip a Full set of Infused Tanzanite Armour to Gain a Permenant Slow Falling Boost
